title: CRM
description: This CRM application allows users to efficiently manage customer data, track interactions, and organize sales processes.

title: Cloud Management Website
description: This cloud management website provides an intuitive platform for managing cloud services effectively. Developed using React, it offers a seamless and responsive user experience, allowing users to monitor, manage, and optimize their cloud resources efficiently.

title: YouTube Clone
description: This YouTube clone replicates key features of the popular video-sharing platform, providing a clean, responsive interface for browsing, searching, and watching videos.

title: CRUD App
description: Built using React for the frontend and Django REST Framework (DRF) for the backend, this app provides a seamless experience in managing data with real-time interactions between the client and the server.

title: Web Scraping
description: This web scraping application automates the extraction and management of data from various websites. Developed using Python with Beautiful Soup, Pandas, and Selenium, the app allows users to log in, register, and manage their tasks efficiently.

title: To-Do App
description: This To-Do app helps users manage their tasks efficiently. Built using Django for the backend and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend, the app provides a simple yet powerful interface for task management.

title: Tour Website
description: Built using React for a seamless user experience, the website showcases stunning visuals and user-friendly navigation for users to explore various tour packages.

title: Travel Website
description: This travel website is an interactive platform designed to inspire users to explore and book their next adventure.

title: Food Delivery Website
description: This food website is a vibrant platform designed for food enthusiasts to explore and discover recipes. Built with React, it delivers a smooth and interactive user experience.

title: Tool Provider Website
description: This tool provider website serves as an online platform for users to discover, compare, and purchase a wide range of developer tools. Built with React, it offers a responsive and user-friendly interface.

title: LMS WebApp
description: This Learning Management System (LMS) web app is built with React for a dynamic front-end experience and styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern look.

title: Vintage Books Market (Upcoming)
description: An upcoming full-stack web application for buying and selling used and vintage books. Developed with React, Redux for state management, and Django REST Framework (DRF) for the backend. The platform will feature user authentication, book listings, search functionality, and secure transactions. Contributor : Ankita Modi has played a key role in frontend development.
